[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

theorem omnimath2162

(hP : P = {f : Fin 3 → ℝ | (∀ i : Fin 3, f i ∈ Set.Icc (-1) 1) ∧ (|f 0| + |f 1| + |f 2| + |f 0 + f 1 + f 2| = |f 0 + f 1| + |f 1 + f 2| + |f 2 + f 0|)})
: (MeasureTheory.volume P).toReal = omnimath2162_answer :=

This pattern suggests the volume of set P, constrained by variable ranges and sum absolute value conditions, reduces to the fixed minimal volume of the cube [-1, 0]³, thus answer is -1.
